verses.verse: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwelt יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מְגוּרֵ֣י <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-Rei was a stranger אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; wherein his father בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These תֹּלְד֣וֹת <S%H8435><s%> to-le-Dot These [are] the generations יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob יוֹסֵ֞ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁבַֽע־ <S%H7651><s%> she-va'- seven עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become רֹעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh was feeding אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav with his brethren בַּצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> batz-Tzon, the flock וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he נַ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar, and the lad אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei [was] with the sons בִלְהָ֛ה <S%H1090><s%> vil-Hah of Bilhah וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and with the sons זִלְפָּ֖ה <S%H2153><s%> zil-Pah of Zilpah נְשֵׁ֣י <S%H802><s%> ne-Shei wives אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father's וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef and Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבָּתָ֥ם <S%H1681><s%> dib-ba-Tam report רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah their evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem. unto his father

וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El, Now Israel אָהַ֤ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav loved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, more than all his children כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- because he [was] the son זְקֻנִ֥ים <S%H2208><s%> ze-ku-Nim of his old age ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he ל֑וֹ lo; וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah and he made ל֖וֹ lo כְּתֹ֥נֶת <S%H3801><s%> ke-To-net him a coat פַּסִּֽים׃ <S%H6446><s%> pas-Sim. of [many] colours

וַיִּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U saw אֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, And when his brethren כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֹת֞וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אָהַ֤ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav loved אֲבִיהֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem that their father מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, him more than all his brethren וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ <S%H8130><s%> vai-yis-ne-'U they hated אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu him and could דַּבְּר֥וֹ <S%H1696><s%> dab-be-Ro not speak לְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom. peaceably

וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם <S%H2492><s%> vai-ya-cha-Lom dreamed יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph חֲל֔וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom, a dream וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and he told לְאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> le-'e-Chav; [it] his brethren וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu him yet the more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od even שְׂנֹ֥א <S%H8130><s%> se-No and they hated אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; about שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'u- unto them Hear נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> na Please הַחֲל֥וֹם <S%H2492><s%> ha-cha-Lom which I have dreamed הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh to this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <S%H2492><s%> cha-La-me-ti. have had

וְ֠הִנֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Ve-hin-neh behold אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we מְאַלְּמִ֤ים <S%H481><s%> me-'al-le-Mim were binding אֲלֻמִּים֙ <S%H485><s%> 'a-lum-Mim sheaves בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch hope הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, in the field וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and lo קָ֥מָה <S%H6965><s%> Ka-mah arose אֲלֻמָּתִ֖י <S%H485><s%> 'a-lum-ma-Ti and lo my sheaf וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and also נִצָּ֑בָה <S%H5324><s%> nitz-Tza-vah; and also stood upright וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold תְסֻבֶּ֙ינָה֙ <S%H5437><s%> te-sub-Bei-nah stood round about אֲלֻמֹּ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H485><s%> 'a-lum-Mo-tei-Chem, and behold your sheaves וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖יןָ <S%H7812><s%> vat-tish-ta-cha-Vei-na and made obeisance לַאֲלֻמָּתִֽי׃ <S%H485><s%> la-'a-lum-ma-Ti. to my sheaf

וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru said לוֹ֙ lo אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, And his brethren הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ha-ma-Loch to him Shalt thou indeed תִּמְלֹךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> tim-loCh reign עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, over אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or מָשׁ֥וֹל <S%H4910><s%> ma-Shol over us;or shalt thou indeed תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> tim-Shol have dominion בָּ֑נוּ Ba-nu; וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu him yet the more עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od even שְׂנֹ֣א <S%H8130><s%> se-No over us;And they hated אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו <S%H2472><s%> cha-lo-mo-Tav for his dreams וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- over דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rav. and for his words

וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם <S%H2492><s%> vai-ya-cha-Lom And he dreamed עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od still חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> cha-Lom dream אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher, yet another וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-Per and told אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To לְאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> le-'e-Chav; it his brethren וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Lo חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי <S%H2492><s%> cha-Lam-ti Behold I have dreamed חֲלוֹם֙ <S%H2472><s%> cha-lOm a dream ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, still וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh more and behold the sun וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> ve-hai-ya-Re-ach, and the moon וְאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'a-Chad a עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים <S%H3556><s%> ko-cha-Vim, stars מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים <S%H7812><s%> mish-ta-cha-Vim made obeisance לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-Per And he told אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אָבִיו֮ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv [it] to his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אֶחָיו֒ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav and to his brethren וַיִּגְעַר־ <S%H1605><s%> vai-yig-'ar- rebuked בּ֣וֹ bo אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, and his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him and said ל֔וֹ lo, מָ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What הַחֲל֥וֹם <S%H2472><s%> ha-cha-Lom unto him What [is] this dream הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that חָלָ֑מְתָּ <S%H2492><s%> cha-La-me-ta; that thou hast dreamed הֲב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ha-Vo indeed נָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> na-Vo, come אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I וְאִמְּךָ֣ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-me-Cha ;Shall I and thy mother וְאַחֶ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chei-cha, and thy brethren לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֥ת <S%H7812><s%> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to bow down לְךָ֖ le-Cha אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. common

וַיְקַנְאוּ־ <S%H7065><s%> vay-kan-'u- envied ב֖וֹ vo אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; And his brethren וְאָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> ve-'a-Viv him but his father שָׁמַ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mar observed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var. the saying

וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav; And his brethren לִרְע֛וֹת <S%H7462><s%> lir-'ot to feed אֶׅתׅ־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon flock אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem their father's בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> bish-Chem. in Shechem

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, unto Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo are not אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha Do not thy brethren רֹעִ֣ים <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Im feed בִּשְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> bish-Chem, Shechem לְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah and I וְאֶשְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <S%H7971><s%> ve-'esh-la-cha-Cha and I will send thee אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; to וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto them And he said ל֖וֹ lo הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Ne-ni. will go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said ל֗וֹ lo, לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> lech- Go נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na now רְאֵ֜ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh I pray thee see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> she-Lom whether it be well אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha with thy brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> she-Lom and well הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, with the flocks וַהֲשִׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-shi-Ve-ni again דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; me word וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-la-Che-hu So he sent מֵעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> me-'E-mek him out of the vale חֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron, of Hebron וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and he came שְׁכֶֽמָה׃ <S%H7927><s%> she-Che-mah. to Shechem

וַיִּמְצָאֵ֣הוּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tza-'E-hu found him אִ֔ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'Ish, him וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold תֹעֶ֖ה <S%H8582><s%> to-'Eh and behold [he was] wandering בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh; in the field וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֧הוּ <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'a-Le-hu asked him הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H582><s%> ha-'Ish another לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What תְּבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> te-vak-Kesh. What seekest

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chai my brethren אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh; I seek הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> hag-gi-dah- tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na please לִ֔י Li, אֵיפֹ֖ה <S%H375><s%> 'ei-Foh me I pray thee where הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they רֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Im. they feed

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And the man נָסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> na-se-'U They are departed מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, hence כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti for I heard אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, them say נֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ne-le-Chah go דֹּתָ֑יְנָה <S%H1886><s%> do-Ta-ye-nah; to Dothan וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, his brethren וַיִּמְצָאֵ֖ם <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tza-'Em and found בְּדֹתָֽן׃ <S%H1886><s%> be-do-Tan. them in Dothan

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U And when they saw אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok; him afar off וּבְטֶ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2962><s%> u-ve-Te-rem and before יִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav even before he came near אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to וַיִּֽתְנַכְּל֥וּ <S%H5230><s%> vai-yit-nak-ke-Lu unto them they conspired אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-To. against him to slay
